title: Daniel Geey
text:
Daniel Geey is a British sports lawyer and author of "Done Deal".
Life.
Geey attended the <a href="University%20of%20Manchester">University of Manchester</a>. He is currently a Partner at Sheridans, where his clients include <a href="Premier%20League">Premier League</a> and the <a href="UEFA%20Champions%20League">UEFA Champions League</a> football clubs, athletes and sporting companies. He has written for "<a href="The%20Times">The Times</a>", "<a href="Daily%20Mail">Daily Mail</a>" and "<a href="The%20Daily%20Telegraph">Daily Telegraph</a>" and is the author of "Done Deal: An Insider's Guide to Football Contracts, Multi-Million Pound Transfers and Premier League Big Business", published by <a href="Bloomsbury%20Publishing">Bloomsbury Publishing</a> in September 2020.
The "<a href="Financial%20Times">Financial Times</a>" described Geey as 'one of the most sought-after advisers for players, agents and clubs'.
